p: Sixty-seven sequences from the isolated strains and 58 reference sequences from GenBank were aligned with ClustalW implemented in the MEGA software version 4.0 package [ 14]. Phylogenetic trees were constructed with the maximum parsimony and maximum-likelihood methods incorporated in the MEGA software version 5.0 package using the Kimura two-parameter model. The bootstrap value was 1000 replicates and only values >50 are presented.
